trans-unit.source: Specifies the class a type or member uses to filter the types that are displayed in the class browser dialog box.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The class you use to filter the types to display in the class browser dialog box must implement <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider>.
Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute.TypeFilterProviderTypeName%2A> property to determine the name of the filter class.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute"></xref> class by using the specified type name.
A string that contains the name of the type that implements <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider"></xref> to apply to the class or member.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute"></xref> class.
A <xref:System.Type> that implements <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider"></xref> to apply to the class or member.
Gets the name of the type that implements <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider"></xref>.
A string that contains the name of the type that implements <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider"></xref>.
